content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-4.5, 23.0)
Consists of boiler (position -4.5, 23.0), steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5). The boiler is currently out of fuel and not connected to a power network, while the offshore pump is working and supplying water.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to get a boiler entity
- Ensure that the boiler is placed correctly at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it. The error indicates that there is no boiler entity at the given coordinates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
